prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon that resembles a futuristic gadget with a sleek design.
Imagine a ghostly Pokemon that can change form based on its environment and mood.
Show me a Pokemon that combines mechanical elements with a vibrant color palette.
Design a Pokemon that embodies both technology and nature, with unique features.

Give me a legendary Pokemon that travels through urban landscapes, leaving traces of energy.

Sharp, pointed top resembling an antenna
